hi: Hi there! What are you doing? 😊 Let's have a fun chat!
xd: Nothing much, what about you? 😄 Just chilling here!
gm: Good morning sweetheart! ☀️ Hope your day is as amazing as you!
gn: Good night darling! 🌙 Sleep tight and sweet dreams!
bye: Bye my dear! 👋 Take care and stay safe!
lowde: Please don’t use bad words. 🙅 It’s not nice for anyone!
gandu: Avoid using rude words, kids! 🚫 Be respectful always!
kiya: Oh no! Don’t say such things! 🧘‍♂️ Let’s stay kind!
love: Love is just a four-letter word, kiddos! ❤️ Spread it wisely!
hy: Hi kids! What are you doing? 👋 Hope you're smiling!
fuck: Please don’t use such words! 😬 Let’s keep it clean here!
my: Who’s that? 🤔 Is it your dad you're teasing with love?
lol: I'm not crazy! 😜 But you're definitely making me go wild!
sudu: Nope, I’m not fair-skinned! 🤭 I’m just naturally cool!
kauda: It’s me! 🫣 The one and only!
bot: I’m just a character, silly! 🎭 But I’ve got style!
